attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: your goverment stared this war ,now have the same guts , to stand up for our heroes ,fighting in a war you lot ,sent them to die for

rejection.details: It is not clear what you are requesting the government actually do. Please rephrase your petition and resubmit.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
